column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bumi says : " You in the Spirit World yet ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " No , I am not , and stop bugging me . "
#Text=Kya says : " It 's okay , Tenzin .
#Text=Just give me some time .
#Text=" Kya says : " Stop being so stubborn .
#Text=It 's not your destiny .
#Text=I think Jinora was meant to guide the Avatar .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Jinora will not enter the Spirit World !
#Text=She 's not ready for the dangers of the other side , but I am .
#Text=I 've spent years training , studying , and mastering everything there is to know about the Spirit World .
#Text=" Korra says : " Tenzin , we 're running out of time .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " If everyone could just be quiet and let me focus .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Aunt Kya is right .
#Text=I can guide Korra into the Spirit World .
#Text=I 'll be all right .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Perhaps I will never have the connections with spirits like I always wanted ... like my father wanted me to have .
#Text=" Jinora says : " It 's okay , Daddy .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm proud of you .
#Text=Go .
#Text=Close the portal .
#Text=We 'll wait here and keep your bodies safe till you return .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 'll be all right .
#Text="
